subject: Business/Funct. Analyst (1. Junior (1-3)) for SWIFT - SWI000578  - Reactiedatum verlengd!
text_body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB



Hallo collega’s,



Voor Swift zoeken we Business/Funct. Analyst (1. Junior (1-3)) SWI000578  die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:
Uiterste reactiedatum: 30/09/2022
Gewenste startdatum: 01/09/2022
Einddatum: 31/12/2022
Referentie: SWI000578
Titel: Business/Funct. Analyst (1. Junior (1-3)
Locatie: The Netherlands - Zoeterwoude (Energieweg 33, 2382 NC Zoeterwoude, Nederland)
Status: Gepubliceerd
Type contract: Time & material

Aantal personen: 1
Afdeling: Technology Platform (TP)

Omschrijving

About the Role

Reporting to the Manager of the Cloud Business Office, the Cloud and Hosting Services Analyst for SWIFT will be helping to collect and analyze data to provide Cloud financial insights critical to our success as a business as it relates to an Infrastructure and Operations organization.

Responsibilities:

-Produce insightful reports that can be shared with and actioned by Management
-Work effectively with cross-functional teams globally, assimilating requirements, driving results in the form of data insights and building strategic partnerships
-Support the FinOps team with setting goals/KPIs, retrieving data and modeling
-Act as the technical expert for the Cost Transparency tools/dashboards. This includes configuring functionality, creating/enhancing visualizations, maintaining design and guidance documentation, and providing support
-Partner heavily with our Cloud Governance team to map data process flows, allowing FinOps to gather a single source of data source
-Analyze and forecast cloud hosting costs
-Provide cost optimization recommendations
-Create and maintain month-end and quarter-end reports
-Use Agile methodology for planning and execution
-Leverage the Cloud Financial Management (CFM) tools, interpret the findings, and make technical recommendations to the business application teams to help reduce ongoing cost

Professional Skills:

-Experience with automation technologies for CI/CD (Jenkins, Azure DevOps, AWS Code pipeline)
-Experience with visualization tools (e.g., QuickSight, Power BI)
-Knowledge of cloud cost products (e.g., Cost Explorer, Azure Portal)
-Experience with Python, JSON, YAML, ARM, Cloud Formation
-Knowledge of cloud management and governance tools (e.g., Cloud Custodian, Trusted Advisor)
-Familiarity with monitoring tools such as CloudWatch, CloudTrail, etc.
-Detail-oriented with excellent documentation skills/methodologies, who can successfully manage multiple priorities
-Demonstrable high level of intellectual curiosity, external perspective, and innovation interest
-Strong communication skills, including the ability to articulate complex technical topics to a non-technical or leadership audience

Qualifications:

-Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or related field
-2+ years working in cloud computing or IT infrastructure/platforms or Finance role
-2+ years of experience with AWS and/or Azure




Vaardigheden

SPECIFIEKE VAARDIGHEDEN

AWS or Azure certification:   Ja
Cloud computing or IT infrastructure/platforms or Finance role:   Junior (1-3) ( 2,00 jaar )
Cloud cost management tools:   Junior (1-3) ( 2,00 jaar )







Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.

Alvast hartelijk bedankt.





Kind regards,

[http://media.gutsglory.be/cronos/signatures/201606_cronos/cronos-groep.png]

subject: Gezocht: Project Manager (Overheidsklant)
text_body:
Beste collega’s,

Voor een overheidsklant regio Brussel (Anderlecht) zijn we op zoek naar een Senior Project Manager. Meer info:

Gewenste startdatum: 04/03/2024
Voorlopige einddatum: 31/12/2024
Regime: Voltijds
Locatie: Brussel (Anderlecht)
Talen: NL of FR + ENG
Remote/onsite: 2d onsite, 3d remote

Omschrijving
The primary role of the Project Manager is to work closely with customers to drive the successful delivery of IT projects

  *   1st, 2nd Line Support and Technical Field services
  *   End user Services: Engineering and Device Platform Management
  *   Problem- & Change Management and Business Service Management
  *   Request, Fulfillment, Invoicing, Tendering
  *   Quality Assurance & Continuous Improvement
  *   Facility Security Management for Safety, Security and Building technologies
  *   Telecom: Telephony solutions, Radio Solutions
  *   Infrastructure: Infrastructure, Nework and Computing
The Project Manager will facilitate the management of scope for the customer’s requirements, plan implementations and deliver to the planned scope and budget.

Verantwoordelijkheden

  *   Leads project delivery from beginning to end;
  *   Define project scope, goals and deliverables that support business goals in collaboration with management and stakeholders;
  *   Develop full-scale project plans and associated communications documents following the company’s standard;
  *   Draft and submit budget proposals, and recommend subsequent budget changes where necessary as per defined process;
  *   Ensure that project meets it’s deliverables in agreed schedule, as per the scope, within stipulated budget and as per the quality standards;
  *   Effectively communicate project expectations to team lead and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion;
  *   Ensures project or service scope and deliverables are defined and agreed with all relevant parties;
  *   Liaise with client and IT Teams on an ongoing basis
  *   Diagnoses and evaluates potential risks and issues throughout the project and executes appropriate plans to mitigate them. Reports regularly to the Team Lead and Stakeholders with regard to risks,
  *   Be a key member of the overall Operations Team

Kennis & ervaring

  *   15 + years relevant experience with project management in different domains
  *   Strong affinity with enterprise technology and its complexity is an added value, like active directory, Computing, storage, cloud, network
  *   Relevant experience and proven record in one of the following domains as PM :
     *   Windows platform (8, 10, 11)
     *   Mobile devices (smartphones, tablets,…)
     *   Infrastructure (network, storage, computing, cloud)
  *   Experience within Public Sector will also be considered an asset
  *   Recognises and applies our Core Values: Professionalism, Respect, Entrepreneurship, Corporation and Leadership
  *   Demonstrated “can do” work ethic coupled with effective time management and ability to overcome ambiguously or under-defined problems
  *   Knowledge of Agile delivery methodology and SAFe (Essentials) are considered an asset
  *   ITIL Certification is a MUST. Project Methodology Certification is a MUST.
  *   Can facilitate Steerco, project update meetings and guide resources.
  *   Possesses the ability to communicate, present and produce documentation on various levels for differing audiences
  *   Proficient in Dutch or French, and English.

Als je een geschikte kandidaat hebt dan hoor ik het graag.

Met vriendelijke groeten,
Wout

subject: Acerta - medior test engineer
text_body:
Hallo collega’s,

Voor Acerta ben ik op zoek naar een medior test engineer.

De Test Engineer zal ingezet worden om de Analisten in het Connect team te ontlasten op vlak van testing.

Hieronder kan je de vacatureomschrijving terugvinden. Graag een zo goed mogelijke match op de verantwoordelijkheden en functievereisten.

Locatie is Leuven (naast station) en 2 dagen/week op kantoor.
Fulltime opdracht – lange termijn
Indien kandidaten graag CV, kostprijs en beschikbaarheid.

Prettig weekend,
Stefan


Functieomschrijving:
Als Software Test Engineer vervul je een cruciale rol om ervoor te zorgen dat onze software naadloos functioneert. Je verdeelt je tijd tussen bestaande en nieuwe projecten en bent actief op zoek naar manieren om de software uitgebreid en waar mogelijk geautomatiseerd te testen.
Met jouw geduldige en gestructureerde aanpak zorg je ervoor dat geen enkel scenario over het hoofd wordt gezien. Kwaliteit staat voorop, en je bent leergierig. Jij zorgt ervoor dat het systeem stabiel en betrouwbaar blijft. Je bent communicatief sterk en werkt nauw samen met analisten, ontwikkelaars, product managers, testcoördinators en andere teamleden om de best mogelijke resultaten te behalen.

Verantwoordelijkheden:

  *   Maken van verbetervoorstellen om onze test coverage/strategy te verbeteren
  *   Opstellen van testplannen op basis van specificaties en functionele vereisten
  *   Uitvoeren van handmatige en geautomatiseerde tests op onze Java- en web-gebaseerde software toepassing
  *   Inpassen van de tests in de bestaande Github Actions CI/CD pipelines
  *   Identificeren, registreren en bijhouden van bugs om de kwaliteit van software te waarborgen
  *   Rapporteren over de voortgang van testactiviteiten aan de testcoördinator
  *   Ondersteuning van UAT testen met business testers
  *   Waar mogelijk automatisering toevoegen aan het testproces

     *   Creëren, beheren en uitvoeren van geautomatiseerde testscripts

Functievereisten:

  *   Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring als Software Test Engineer.
  *   Analytisch denkvermogen en aandacht voor detail.
  *   Effectieve communicatie en samenwerkingsvaardigheden.
  *   Kennis van testautomatiseringstools zoals Selenium of iets gelijkwaardigs
  *   Kennis van BDD methodologie is een plus
  *   Uitschrijven, verfijnen en uitvoeren van geautomatiseerde testscenarios met Cucumber (Java; BDD)
  *   Gebruik van Git
  *   Gebruik van een IDE (zoals IntelliJ)
  *   Basiskennis SQL



Stefan 
Managing Partner Cronos Leuven

3001 Heverlee

subject: Gezocht: Service Desk Agent - Onsite Support
text_body:
Beste P&C’s,

Voor één van onze klanten zijn wij op zoek naar een Service Desk Agent voor de Onsite Support, meer info hieronder.

Deze persoon zal niet op de servicedesk zitten maar rondlopen in de gebouwen en end user support geven, laptops installeren ( en stagen via Intune), printer problemen oplossen etc.
Kan ook ingezet worden voor technische ondersteuning op events.

Klantvriendelijkheid is belangrijk.
NL + ENG (FR is een plus maar geen vereiste)

Senioriteit: 2 a 3 jaar volstaat, meer mag ook
Locatie: Vlaams-Brabant

Hebben jullie kandidaten?


Service Desk Agent - Onsite Support
Assisting with the installation, configuration, maintenance and disposal of ICT equipment and materials
The assignment
As an onsite support agent, you will be part of a dynamic and customer-oriented team that provides high-quality ICT services to our internal stakeholders. You will be responsible for:

  *   Assisting with the installation, configuration, maintenance and disposal of ICT equipment and materials;
  *   Managing the inventory of ICT assets and supplies and ordering new items when needed;
  *   Supporting the use of printers, mobile devices and meeting room devices and ensuring their functionality and availability;
  *   Troubleshooting and resolving common technical problems related to hardware, software, network, security and applications;
  *   Documenting and updating the status of incidents and service requests in our system;
  *   Following up with customers to ensure their satisfaction and feedback;
Required knowledge and skills

  *   You have a proven experience in a similar role;
  *   You have experience in supporting hardware devices;
  *   You have working knowledge of IT Service Management, more specific on asset management, incident and service request management;
  *   You work in a structured way, adhering to internal processes;
  *   You have good communication skills;
Technical Skills:

  *   Proficiency in troubleshooting hardware, and software issues is essential.
Customer Service Skills:

  *   Excellent communication skills are crucial for effectively interacting with users to understand their issues and provide clear instructions or solutions. Patience, empathy, and active listening are key attributes.
Time Management:

  *   ICT service desk agents often deal with multiple support tickets simultaneously. Prioritization skills and the ability to manage workload effectively are essential
Teamwork:

  *   Collaboration with other IT service desk agents and other IT personnel is necessary for resolving complex issues.
  *   Being a team player and having the ability to work collaboratively is beneficial.
What we offer
We offer you an exciting temporary assignment in which you will be part of a community that makes the impossible possible. Together, we shape the technology that will define the society of tomorrow.

  *   Duration of the assignment, 6 months fulltime (5 days/week, 40 hours), extension is possible
  *   Desired start date is as soon as available
Location

  *   Please note that working from home is not possible for this position, as the nature of the tasks involved requires being physically present in the office. We believe in fostering a vibrant and interactive work environment that promotes effective collaboration, creativity, and productivity in this challenging assignment.


Met vriendelijke groeten, bien à vous, kind regards,

subject: Gezocht : Service Delivery Manager - Mobile
text_body:
Collega’s,

Voor onze klant Telenet te Mechelen zoeken we onderstaand profiel.

De Service Delivery Manager (SDM) is eindverantwoordelijk voor het effectief en efficiënt functioneren van zowel interne als externe stakeholders om de belangen en doelstellingen van onze klanten en het bedrijf te dienen. De SDM verzekert de diensten en beheert leveranciers en contracten, terwijl hij/zij streeft naar het identificeren en aansturen van zowel transformatie en voortdurende verbeteringen als cost leadership.


  *   End-to-End verantwoordelijk zijn voor het respectievelijke operationele domein en bepalen als zodanig van zijn strategie, roadmap, werkwijze en meest geschikte middelen die nodig zijn en optreden als een "go to" persoon voor de betreffende vragen en adequate acties.
  *   (Her)definiëren, in samenwerking met de verschillende stakeholders, van de doelstellingen en/of KPI's binnen het framework.


  *   End-to-End beheren van dienstverlening, verwerken en ervoor zorgen dat de operationele activiteiten correct worden uitgevoerd volgens de richtlijnen, normen, gedefinieerde Service Level Agreements (SLA's), budget en prioriteiten.
  *   Voortdurend opvolgen van de verschillende diensten/processen om te verzekeren dat deze in lijn zijn met de vooropgestelde doelstellingen en/of dat de Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) en de klanttevredenheid worden gehaald.


  *   Aansturen van de (strategische) transformatie en continue verbeteringen en cost leadership door creatief/disruptief te denken en door het analyseren en/of identificeren van (structurele) vraagstukken en het voorstellen en/of implementeren van verbeteringen om te zorgen voor tijdige en kosteneffectieve oplossingen voor die vragen, waarbij alle benodigde stakeholders betrokken zijn.


  *   Bouwen en onderhouden van een regelmatig en nauw partnerschap met alle stakeholders, inclusief (S)LT. Verzekeren dat de dienstverlening in lijn blijft met de bedrijfsbehoeften en de behoeften van de klant en vertaalt deze als zodanig in concrete oplossingen en/of acties. Bovendien optreden als bruggenbouwer voor de verschillende teams en zorgen voor een optimale en efficiënte samenwerking.
  *   Sturen, motiveren en begeleiden van de mensen om de dienstverlening zo goed mogelijk te verzekeren.


  *   Bewaken van de kwaliteit van de geleverde diensten en actief aftestemmen met collega's en andere afdelingen/chapters om een goede kwaliteit van de dienstverlening in alle domeinen te verzekeren. Opzetten/uitvoeren van de audits om het geleverde kwaliteitsniveau te bewaken en te waarborgen.


  *   Ondersteunen, bijdragen en begeleiden van de projectoplevering om een soepele operationele acceptatie en operationele uitmuntendheid door de operationele teams te verzekeren. Opzetten en/of leiden van projecten om het functioneren, de prestaties en de efficiëntie van de dienstverlening en/of de ervaring van de klant te verbeteren.

Expertise hebben en leiding kunnen nemen in eigen domein en gerelateerde processen, SLA’s.
Expertise hebben in partners vendors/partnerschap/landschapsmanagement.
Ervaring hebben in het opstellen van strategie, roadmap, werkwijze, contracten, budgettering, middelenallocatie, KPI's.
Bekend zijn met financiële instrumenten zoals budget & actuals, financiële plannen en crediteurenadministratieve processen om (significante) budgetten te kunnen beheren.
In staat zijn om het helikopteroverzicht over de verschillende klanten/ diensten/ projecten te behouden en in staat zijn om de resultaten te interpreteren door oorzaken breder te detecteren dan het eigen domein/ de eigen bedrijfsvoering.
Begrijpen van de Business-2-Business (B2B) en Business-2-Customer (B2C) Telecomindustrie, inclusief business en technologie processen en telecom technologie architecturen.
Beschikken over uitstekende analytische vaardigheden, conceptueel denken gecombineerd met een pragmatische aanpak.
In staat zijn de klantgerichtheid te behouden door actief en gevoelig in te spelen op de behoeften van alle stakeholders en door hun behoeften en prioriteiten begrijpen.
Beschikken over projectmanagementvaardigheden

Masterdiploma met minimum 7 jaar ervaring.
NL - ENG - FR
Goed begrip van technologie- en/of dienstenmanagementervaring in een vergelijkbare sector.

Mvg



Account Manager

2550 KONTICH

subject: System Developer/Programmer (3. Senior (6-9)) SWI000868 - For Swift - reactiedatum verlengd
text_body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB

VOORRANG VASTE MEDEWERKERS


Hallo collega’s,



Voor Swift zoeken we een System Developer/Programmer (3. Senior (6-9)) SWI000868 die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:



Uiterste reactiedatum: 16/02/2024

Gewenste startdatum: 09/01/2024

Einddatum: 31/12/2024

Referentie: SWI000868

Titel: System Developer/Programmer (3. Senior (6-9))

Locatie: Belgium - Brussels (Avenue Adele 1, 1310 La Hulpe, België)

Status: Gepubliceerd

Type contract: Time & material

Categorie: Niet van toepassing

Aantal personen: 1

Afdeling: Technology Platform (TP)


Building on our ambition to deliver our IT infrastructure services applying DevOps practices, we are looking for a skilled DevOps engineer willing to mix their knowledge and expertise within a multi-disciplinary Squad to implement a private cloud solution usable by engineering Squads through Infrastructure-as-Code principles. Our overarching vision is to deliver a Zero-Touch infrastructure landscape controlled by declarative code.

Our IaC solution having left its proof-of-concept phase, the candidate would join at this unique time when thinking, design and implementation is a shared process in which the skills, knowledge and ideas of all Squad members are both required and appreciated to deliver valuable increments to our fellow software developers at Swift.

The Squad is currently comprised of strong developers and the wider group of colleagues we work with to deliver the solution have System Admin profiles. As a consequence, we are looking for a DevOps engineer capable of bridging the gap between the 2 worlds and help us implement a solution that properly interacts with the available infrastructure while being built with state-of-the-art DevOps tools and practices and in a clean, robust and maintainable way. As a consequence to the way the Squad works, prior knowledge and interest in DevOps-related programming languages, technologies and techniques are an important asset for the candidate.

If you are an experienced DevOps engineer willing to build a company-changing infrastructure delivery solution, that you are excited at the idea of designing and building innovative DevOps services , and if you want to learn and share with people having various backgrounds to grow in this area of expertise, you are the ideal candidate. We also understand that finding the perfect match is not always possible and are happy to tweak and align where and when necessary, so apply if interested and we will find together how to make this a fruitful collaboration for both parties.


Key Responsibilities

Brainstorm, analyse, and ideate the Infrastructure-as-Code solution together with your fellow Squad members;
Implement infrastructure automation solutions based on CI/CD pipelines (Cloudbees, Ansible, OCP)
Take part to the engineering process from conceptualization to realization, i.e. Design, Development, Test/Qualify, Deploy and Support / Maintain.
Configure and integrate the solution with existing infrastructure services (Infoblox, Algosec, Red Hat OCP, VMware vRA...)
Develop standardized components used within deployment pipelines for infrastructure components.
Deploy, administer and perform evolutive maintenance on the solution.
Communicate cross-squad to implement and operate the solution.


Technical skills and competencies

Must have:
Good understanding of CI/CD tools and practices with proven prior professional experience (Cloudbees, Ansible...)
Practical experience working using a GitOps operational model
Experience in configuring and administering RHEL-based systems.
Good knowledge of IT infrastructure in general (networking, compute and/or databases) and a willingness to deepen this knowledge.
Understanding the lifecycle of applications and their deployment in non-trivial environments (i.e. in which infrastructure needs to be configured to enable and support the deployment of said applications).
Proficiency in Python and experience delivering Python-based software components
Professional experience with shell scripting
Assets:
Good knowledge of Cloudbees/Jenkins, Ansible and OpenShift/Kubernetes.
Professional experience with other programming languages (for example: JavaScript, Golang, Java, Rust, C/C++)
Cloud deployments and implementation and related IaC technologies (for example: AWS, Azure, Terraform)
Agile methodology.


Professional skills & competencies

Customer oriented: End-users utilization of our solution define its value. You want to provide them with the solution they need in a way that they find pleasant and powerful to use.
Team-player: We value the opinions of all Squad members, whatever their background and title. Everyone on deck all aiming to realize the same vision.
Collaborative and open-minded; willing to share knowledge and grow together with peers having different technical backgrounds and expertise
Proud of your work: You aim to implement a solution that your colleagues will enjoy using far and wide and that will be improved for years to come. You take pride in building strong foundations that fellow engineers will be happy to take part to and capable to master.
Autonomous and driven - while we work in Agile and collaboration is key, the ability and willingness to follow the path to problems' solutions by yourself when possible will help the Squad progress faster
Fluent in English (spoken and written)


Education / Experience

Bachelor’s degree in DevOps, programming or other computer science-related field or equivalent work experience.

3-5 years of experience in DevOps environment.


Opdracht informatie

Projectnaam: Zero-touch management/ IaC

Werkregime: Voltijds

Vaardigheden



ALGEMENE VAARDIGHEDEN



CI/CD tools and practices with proven prior professional experience (Cloudbees, Ansible...): Professional (4-5)


Configuring and administering RHEL-based systems: Professional (4-5)



GitOps operational model: Professional (4-5)


Professional experience with shell scripting: Professional (4-5)


Proficiency in Python and experience delivering Python-based software components: Professional (4-5)

--------------------------------------------------------



Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.



Alvast bedankt!


Met vriendelijke groeten,



[signature_1929168496]

Channice Willems

Executive Assistant - Business & Sales Support



+324## ## ## ##



De Cronos Groep nv

Veldkant 33A, 2550 Kontich

subject: Vacature - Cloud Platform Engineer (senior)
text_body:
Beste P&C,

Voor een klant te Amersfoort hebben we volgende vacature openstaan. Wie heeft een geschikte kandidaat voor dit profiel.

Startdatum: 01/03/2024
Doorlooptijd: 01/03/2024 tot 31/08/2024
Bezetting: Full-time (40u)

Amersfoort / Hybride | 6 maanden + optie op verlenging

Het team levert de infrastructuur en services die nodig zijn voor alle Cloud systemen. Wij werken volgens Cloud native & SaaS principes. In andere woorden, moderne IT Infrastructure-as-a-service. Snelheid is cruciaal voor onze BizDevOps teams en de enige manier om dat te bereiken is met selfservice. Selfservice moet uiteraard niet uitmonden in chaos, daarom moeten guardrails en best practices goed ingericht zijn.

Er is veel interactie met het team, selfservice en GitOps zijn de beste oplossingen om hier effectief met om te gaan.

Team Spark is een platform team met de strategie om te automatiseren wat nodig is. Een goede service provisioning, operational excellence, en ingebouwde security zijn nodig ter ondersteuning van andere teams. Het platform team is de primaire, kritieke schakel in de keten, daarom streven we naar het hoogste service niveau.

Dit ga je doen:

Werken aan het fundament van de IT oplossingen, het platform in AWS o.b.v. RedHat OpenShift (ROSA) en zijn bouwblokken.
Ondersteunen en begeleiden van DevOps teams bij cloud vraagstukken.
Opzetten en onderhouden van netwerkinfrastructuur, beveiliging en koppelingen met SaaS diensten in de AWS Cloud.
Uiteraard wordt ontwikkeld volgens het Infrastructure-as-code principe. Dit doen we vrijwel volledig met Terraform, Helm en in sommige gevallen CDK en middels GitOps.
BizDevOps teams in staat stellen om bouwblokken te gebruiken en te configureren via selfservice op basis van automation die jij (door)ontwikkelt. CI/CD tools hebben geen geheimen voor jou.
Actieve samenwerking met DevOps teams in hoe de bouwblokken het meest effectief kunnen worden ingezet om hun doelen te bereiken.
Het aanmoedigen van en het zelf actief meewerken aan de ontwikkeling van geautomatiseerde processen.

Hier krijg jij energie van:

Jij bent een senior Cloud engineer met brede ervaring en raakvlakken heeft het grootste deel van ons platform. Jij weet hoe je solide cloud oplossingen bouwt en speelt daarin een adviserender en faciliterende rol. Je bent service oriented en kunt jezelf goed verplaatsen in een positie in zowel je eigen team als in andere DevOps teams. Je hebt goede communicatievaardigheden, een stevig track-record op het gebied van consulting, support, troubleshooting en ontwikkeling van complexe oplossingen. Daarnaast ben jij klantgericht en resultaat gedreven, kun je zelfstandig werken en leer en werk je graag in een dynamische omgeving.

Dit neem verder je mee:

AWS Expertise - Solution Architect Professional Level
Minimaal 2+ jaar werkervaring met KubernetesMinimaal
2+ jaar werkervaring met Terraform, Helm
Ervaring met ITSM processen - change en incidement management
Brede ervaring in Cloud ontwikkeling en Infrastructure-as-code (bijv. Terraform, Cloudformation, CDK, Helm, etc.)
Automation en scripting talen zoals Python, Bash, Ruby of Go
Kennis van en ervaring met schaalbare en gedistribueerde omgevingen
Kennis van en ervaring met diverse communicatie protocollen (bijv. REST, Streaming, bulk connections, etc.) en availability mechanismen (bijv. circuit breaker, retry mechanisms, Service Mesh, etc.)
Uitgebreide ervaring met observabillity en alle pilaren: monitoring, metrics, logging en tracing systemen (bijv. Prometheus, Thanos, Grafana, Grafana Loki, Grafana Tempo)
Uitgebreide ervaring met database oplossingen zoals: PostGresql, MySQL, MongoDB
Uitgebreide ervaring met het opzetten van Continuous Delivery/Deployment systemen (bijv. GitLab CI/CD, Github, AzureDevOps, ArgoCD)
Ervaring met security aspecten van Cloud omgevingen
Ervaring met SAFe en Agile scrum (pré)
Bedreven in DevOps stijl van werken.

Talen:

Perfect Nederlands is een vereiste.

subject: GLS - Backend Engineer (Serverless architectures, TypeScript & AWS Lambda)
text_body:
Beste P&C,

Voor onze klant GLS zijn wij op zoek naar een Backend Engineer.
We zoeken hier naar een medior / senior profiel. De main tech stack is als volgt: Serverless architectures, TypeScript & AWS Lambda, voor meer info zie vacature hieronder.

Locatie: Drogenbos
Remote: zéér flexibel 1 a 2 dagen kantoor (in het begin meer)
Duurtijd: lange termijn
Opstart: asap

Hebben jullie iemand beschikbaar?

About the job
Steer our Journey into the Digital World with an Innovative Team*

Role Overview - TEAM

  *   Technological Engagement: Dive into our world of digital transformation.
  *   Embedded in Operations: Become a part of our dedicated digitalization team, operating like a vibrant startup within the heart of the organization.
  *   Adaptive Roles: We seek a top-notch Backend Engineer, ready for both steady roles and freelance engagement.
  *   Mentor & Migrate: Continuously grow and guide us on the digital front, playing a pivotal role in transitioning our core operations into the digital age.

Key Deliverables - CRAFT

  *   Code & Create: Design and refine our Backend applications.
  *   Resourceful Operations: Lead our API strategies and integrations.
  *   Assured Sta bility: Ensure robustness through diligent testing.
  *   Focused Collaboration: Engage proactively within the team, sharing insights.
  *   Technical Execution: Launch tech solutions aligned with operational needs and market trends.

Competences and Qualifications - SKILL

  *   Software Mastery: We require candidates to have a minimum of 3 years of experience in software development, with strong expertise in backend technologies, including Serverless architectures, TypeScript, and AWS Lambda, among others.
  *   Knowledge of APIs: Profound understanding of API development, maintenance, and integration.
  *   Innovative Tech Adaptability: Quick to embrace and integrate new technologies, tools and responsibilities.
  *   Lifecycle of Testing: Candidates are expected to demonstrate familiarity with testing practices, automation, and test-driven development as part of their competencies.
  *   Leader in Collaboration: Prioritizing effective teamwork and fostering strong team connections.

Why Join Us? - QUEST

  *   Qualitative Growth: Opportunities for mutual professional development.
  *   Unmatched Balance: Work-life harmony with 2-3 days remote work weekly.
  *   Enabling Environment: A space where ideas are heard and innovation is organic.
  *   Stellar Projects: Engage with initiatives that reshape the way we operate.
  *   Trust-centered Team: Collaborate in an environment of mutual respect and understanding.

Recruitment Process:

  *   Initial Interaction: A chat to get acquainted and assess cultural fit.
  *   Technical Assessment: If our initial talk feels mutually right, you'll be invited for a practical task or a Q&A session to gauge your expertise.
  *   Proposal: If your skills align with our expectations, we'll extend a warm invitation to join our team.


Met vriendelijke groeten, bien à vous, kind regards,

subject: Cloud Security Engineer (Cloudflare) (4728) - for Euroclear
text_body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB

VOORRANG AAN VASTE WERKNEMERS





Beste collega’s,



Voor Euroclear zoeken we een  Cloud Security Engineer (Cloudflare) (4728)  die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:





 Job Info

_____________________________________________________


Organization: Euroclear SA/NV
Location: Poland | Belgium
Full or Part Time
Target start date: 2/26/24
Duration (for temporary positions only): 1 year
Watch duty: YES
Shifts? No
Travel Required: No
Weekend work: Yes
UK only- Watch duty - secondary
Reference Profile: IT System Engineer Intermediate


 Job Details

_____________________________________________________

Job Description
Cloud Security Engineer – Cloudflare Experience


Division
As a global critical financial infrastructure, the protection of Euroclear information and assets is fundamental to the company’s business. Security is at the core of our services, firmly embedded in the management systems and processes of the company. You will be joining our CISO Division – Platform Security department in charge of putting in place the required technical solution to protect effectively our applications.

You will join CISO Customer Security Operation & Security Engineering Team in the role of Cloud Security Engineer (Cloudflare).

Role


  *   Deploy, support and maintain Cloudflare solution in a Dual Layer WAF Strategy.
  *   Participate in Projects related to security and business on the Euroclear roadmap.
  *   Resolve incidents related to security products and solution in place.
  *   Participate in the automation process and continuous improvement process.
  *   Participate in the Watch Duty role. (24/7/365) to face the evolving threats (Global Cyber Security team).
  *   Participate to the transformation of the team to Agile.

Technical skills


  *   Cloudflare expertise / Cloudflare WAF knowledge is required (at least 3 years)
  *   Good knowledge of the 7 layers of the OSI model.
  *   Good knowledge of HTTP, HTTPS, SSL, TLS/mTLS
  *   Knowledge Authentication technologies. (SAML/OAUTH/…)
  *   Knowledge and experience of Imperva WAF/WAAP on premise, SAAS and Cloud are a clear asset for the role
  *   Development: Python, other languages are an asset.


Nice to have :


  *   Terraform/Ansible knowledge & Automation experience
  *   Be a “geek” in one specific technical domain – can be outside of the ones mentioned here above.
  *   Agile, Scrum, Devops knowledges are assets
  *   CISSP and/or OSCP are assets

Others


  *
PKI knowledges
  *
Reverse Proxies : Apache HTTPD,  NGINX are assets.
  *
Linux/Unix System Engineer (RedHat)
  *
Language: English

Soft skills


  *   Team player and supporter.
  *   Client focus.
  *   Open Minded.
  *   Eager to learn and evolve
  *   Understanding a problem in a global context and being able to think out of the box (complex analysis)
  *   Can express well-founded opinions and positions and understand their consequences (judgement)





Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben, ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.



Alvast bedankt!

subject: kandidaat DBA Microsoft SQL Server Expert AG Insurance?
text_body:
Dear,

AG Insurance, after its major IT Transformation Program in 2022, where business applications hosted on Mainframe have been migrated to a Windows solution stack with SQL server as Main database engine, pursues the modernization, industrialization, extension of its SQL Server Data Backbone, towards a more unified Data backbone between Operational & Analytics Databases, to support the new architecture patterns and hosting platforms, continuing to evolve with the technology evolution of Microsoft SQL Server.

In this context, hybridization with On-Premises & Cloud platforms, SQL Server Evolutions and continuous Operating Optimization of the current platform with high Availability and Performance Level, the team manager for the SQL Server environment is looking for a DBA Microsoft SQL Server expert to contribute and support those challenges.



Objective of the job:


In support of the I&O RUN Activities & Transformation Challenges:
• Support and facilitate the transformation change
• Organize and coordinate SQL Server deliverables
• Function as technical expert on SQL Server in close collaboration with the SQL Server team (ETL, performance, troubleshooting, operational excellence, availability of systems, Security management, Security Auditing….)
• Support the Operating Model for SQL Server Operational Databases to the Cloud
• Architecture, develop and document solutions / procedures / scripts to operate the environment
• Share your experience with our SQL Server experts
• Provide coaching and technical guidance to the fellow colleagues when needed
• Act in respect of scope, timing and budget
• Act transparently to the team, the management and the project leading
• Adopt a positive, collaborative and constructive attitude in the team and in the relationship with the stakeholders
• You own a structured approach
• Prepare and support changes, where applicable outside office hours
• You will work in and with multidisciplinary teams where you will fulfill your part of your knowledge and experience.
• Ability to multi-task and context-switch effectively between different activities and teams


Required skills: cfr attachment





Please send me a CV (English) in word + availability + daily rate 8 hours/day, Birthday, Candidate’s Nationality, Candidate’s Preferred language, Status freelance or employee and some relevant references.

Tx!







[CRONOS-logo]



Kind regards,

Kristin

Business development & Account Management

subject: Gezocht: Back-end Applicatie Developer
text_body:
Beste Collega’s,

Allereerst de beste wensen voor 2024, op een gezond en gelukkig jaar!
Ik ben op zoek naar een Back-end Applicatie Developer!

Aspect
Details
Functie
Back-end Applicatie Developer (Python)
Uren per week
40 uur
Locatie
Utrecht
Startdatum
29-01-2024
Opdrachtomschrijving
Ontwikkeling van een Gegevensboekhouding (Data Administratie of Data Catalog) in het kader van gegevensdelings- en gegevenstyperingsbeleid. Dit omvat het vormgeven en implementeren van een organisatorische vaardigheid in gegevensdeling, ondersteuning bij de ontwikkeling van prototypes, PoC's en MVP's, en het schrijven, documenteren en testen van robuuste en schaalbare Python applicaties/API’s.
Specifieke Verantwoordelijkheden
Ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en onderhouden van Python applicaties/API’s, samenwerking met cross-functionele teams, implementeren van SOLID principes en best practices, en bekwaamheid met Azure-services, Elasticsearch, NoSQL en Graph databases.
Achtergrond opdracht
Onderdeel van het programma Open op Orde voor het realiseren van een Gegevensboekhouding binnen de Eindklant.
Functie-eisen
- HBO niveau.
- Minimaal vijf jaar ervaring als Applicatie Back-end Developer.
- Minimaal vijf jaar ervaring met Python (bij voorkeur Flask).
- Minimaal drie jaar ervaring met Microsoft Azure.
- Voldoende score op interviewcriteria en assessment.
Functiewensen
- Aantoonbare ervaring als Applicatie Back-end Developer.
- Kennis van Microsoft Azure cloud omgeving.
- Ervaring met tools en technologieën zoals Python, Flask, FastAPI en RESTful API technologieën.
Overige Vereisten
- Goede communicatieve vaardigheid.
- Proactieve en oplossingsgerichte werkhouding.
- Flexibiliteit in een snel veranderende omgeving.
- Zelfstandigheid en bekwaamheid in het schrijven, documenteren en testen van code.
- Minimaal 3 dagen fysieke aanwezigheid op locatie in Utrecht.



Met vriendelijke groet / Best regards,

subject: Test Engineer (3. Senior (6-9)) SWI000865 - For Swift
text_body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB

VOORRANG VASTE MEDEWERKERS



Hallo collega’s,



Voor Swift zoeken we een Test Engineer (3. Senior (6-9)) die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:

Uiterste reactiedatum: 05/01/2024

Gewenste startdatum: 02/01/2024

Einddatum: 01/07/2024

Referentie: SWI000865

Titel: Business/Funct. Analyst (3. Senior (6-9))

Locatie: Belgium - Brussels (Avenue Adele 1, 1310 La Hulpe, België)

Status: Gepubliceerd

Type contract: Time & material

Categorie: Niet van toepassing

Aantal personen: 1

Afdeling: CE (CE)


The Access Cluster is looking for highly skilled and motivated candidate to join the Web Platform squad. You will have the opportunity to work on a product that is used by most top financial institutions in the world and is key in the digital economy of today.

As a Test Engineer, you will be part of a dynamic software development team environment where your testing skills will be crucial to the delivery of mission critical financial software to the global financial industry following structured development approaches in Agile methodologies.

You will undertake testing activities of medium to high complexity related to software components. You will be required to do development work related to software testing frameworks. Given the mission critical nature of our business, strong emphasis is placed on quality, security, availability, resiliency, scalability, performance, and system resources consumption. It is expected that suitable candidates adhere to a structured testing environment and will actively contribute to delivering software to the quality expectations of our customers.

Responsibilities
As a Test Engineer, you will be part of a dynamic team of professionals and applying agile software developments, testing and delivery practices.
You will actively participate in the whole cycle of development of new user stories: requirements review, solution design, implementation, testing plan and development testing.
Understanding problems, solutions and ensuring the overall consistency of the software will be one of your primary objectives.

You will share team commitments and own some parts of those solutions.
You will perform software delivery tasks (builds, installation of release on test environments, etc).
Our solution can always get better! You will take any opportunity to improve the way we work, the tools we use and the software we produce.

What to expect?
• Collaborate with internal teams (e.g. developers and product owner) to identify system requirements, develop effective strategies and test plans.
• Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle
• Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
• Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
• Design, develop, execute and maintain test cases (manual or automated) and analyse results
• Report bugs and errors to development teams
• Help troubleshoot issues

What will make you successful?
• Bachelor Degree in relevant field of computing (IT, Computer engineering, Computer Science, Informatics)
• 5 years and above of experience in testing
• Familiarity with Agile frameworks is an added advantage
• Testing methodology certification (e.g. ISTQB) is an added advantage (or an asset)
• Analytical mind and problem-solving attitude
• Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision
• Open-minded, solutions oriented, and a true team player gaining energy through collaboration with others.
• Demonstrated strong interpersonal relations, sense of responsibility, commitment and customer focus.
• Ability to prioritize work independently based on business impact and urgency.
• Ability to take proactive actions and have positive attitude.
• Testing background with experience or knowledge of following are nice to have:
o Basic knowledge in functional testing, integration testing, regression testing, performance testing
o Familiar with test management tools (e.g. JIRA, X-Ray), confluence
o Agile Mind-set: You like to learn and continuously improve the way we work
o Team-oriented: you take pride from team achievements and are ready to support and be supported by your team-mates.
o Very good communication skills, including remote meeting setups.
o Curious, eager to learn and to educate others.

Essential Technical Skills:
• Ansible: Basic to good understanding
• Python: Basic to good understanding
• Robot Framework: Good understanding

Candidates with the following skills will have an added advantage. Candidates without these skillets/knowledge are encouraged to apply if they have confidence and willing to be trained.
• Git/Bitbucket: Basic to good understanding
• SQL: Basic to good understanding
• Docker/CICD/DevOps: Basic to good understanding
• Test automation: Basic to good understanding
• Unix/Linux (SELinux): Basic to good understanding

• English: Basic to good understanding


Opdracht informatie

Projectnaam: Web Platform

Werkregime: Voltijds



Vaardigheden



SPECIFIEKE VAARDIGHEDEN


Robot Framework: Senior (6-9)


Test Automation: Senior (6-9)


Testing: Senior (6-9)





Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.



Alvast bedankt.



Vriendelijke groetjes

text_body:
Collega’s,

Voor onze klant BASF Antwerpen te Zandvliet zoek ik een senior profiel voor onderstaande functie.

BASF Antwerpen is het grootste chemische productiecentrum van België en het op een na grootste van de BASF-groep wereldwijd. Met dit project wordt beoogd een nieuwe software suite, op maat van BASF Antwerpen, op te leveren om de operationele taken van de verschillende productie-eenheden te optimaliseren.

De software suite zal bestaan uit verschillende modules die gebruik maken van een PostgreSQL databank, Java Spring Boot back end services en een Angular front end. De applicatie zal in een containerized omgeving draaien.

Profiel
Om het project op te starten zijn we op zoek naar een full stack developer, technical lead die zelfstandig kan werken om deze technology stack in Antwerpen te introduceren. Onze ideale match heeft volgende technische kennis:
PostgreSQL

Angular

Opzetten development omgeving

subject: Dev Ops Engineer - Site Reliability Engineer gezocht voor Nike ELC
text_body:
Collega’s,

Voor Nike ELC zoeken we nog een Dev Ops Engineer - Site Reliability Engineer die voldoet aan de profielbeschrijving in bijlage.



A warehouse control system is a software application used to manage and direct material handling automation systems within a warehouse or distribution center. Warehouse Control Systems (WCS) ensure an efficient product flow across different material handling equipment and sub-systems such as, among others, conveyors, sorters & AS/RS systems. The WCS will control the automated material handling equipment and integrate it with a Warehouse Management System (WMS) that manages and plans warehouse activities from receiving through shipping.

Within Global Technology - EMEA Node Engineering you will be part of the WCS Enablement team, supporting the WCS (Warehouse Control System) Engineering team that implements WCS solutions at the Nike European Logistics Campus in Belgium and builds new WCS capabilities to support & optimize e-commerce and omni-channel fulfillment driven promises and valuable services in EMEA.

As a Dev Ops/SRE Engineer your role on the team will be eliminating toil to increase value towards the business.

Catch up on modern tech practices and standards. Enable, consume and expose data and improve vendor onboarding with speed and quality.

Responsibilities:

• Style guides, versioning practices, source control, branching and merging paterns and advising

other engineers on development standards.

• Develop and advocate for CICD best practices, standards and processes.

• Provide support to our product team, maintain and upgrade the existing configuration

management environment.

• Help evaluate, build and deploy tools to assist with deployment framework required for each

Enterprise platform.

• Develop solutions in alignment with departmental goals, SLA's for availability, scalability and

resiliency.

• Help develop strategies for zero downtime deployments and patching.

• Partner with stakeholders to identify botlenecks and opportunities for improvement in the

deployment and build processes.

• Help troubleshoot issues and work with the team to address root cause to minimize the chance

of a second occurrence.

Find opportunities to automate as part of the problem management process, creating automation to

avoid issues.

• Familiar with DevOps and SRE practices.

Experience:

• Experience functioning as a Sr Automation Engineer or Sr DevOps Engineer.

• Experience in Linux and Windows Administration, Engineering and Automation.

• Experience developing, delivering and operating modern cloud platforms / large scale distributed systems.

• Experience working with revision control systems including Git.

• Experience working in Agile teams and project teams.

• Experience in Apache Kafka and writing stream processing applications.

• Automation background in multiple scripting languages.

• Cloud automation experience with coding in Terraform, CloudFormation or similar.

• Hands on experience with delivering and managing solutions on AWS, Azure.

• Programming experience in languages like Python, Java, C#, Golang.

• Production experience with containers, container runtimes (i. e. Kubernetes), and/or serverless technologies.

• Desire to learn and continually improve self and others though knowledge sharing.

• Closely work with a team of Automation engineers and ensure that the tasks are completed on 􀆟me with

top notch Quality.

• Should be able to work on multiple tracks on priority basis in a fast paced environment.

• Should serve as an escalation point to resolve blocking issues, dependencies, risks.
• Experience with Octopus Deploy is a plus.

subject: Kandidaat IT Developer (Backbone, Javascript, JQuery, React, AJAX, HTML/CSS ...) BNP?
text_body:
Dear,


Role category -
Role profile
 S2 - IT development and integration
 IT Developer - Senior
Job title
 IT Developer (Backbone, Javascript, JQuery, React, AJAX, HTML/CSS ...)
Work location
 BRU.-MONTAGNE DU PARC/WARANDEBERG
 MONTAGNE DU PARC 3
 1000 BRUXELLES
Start date
 asap
End date
 31/12/2023
Description


IT Developer (Backbone, Javascript, JQuery, React, AJAX, HTML/CSS ...)
Mission context
Do you want to be part of the Tribe with the highest visibility in the bank? At CCE-I, you will be part of the actions and you will be the entry point of the bank for the customers. Our tribe is the epicentre of all channels provided by the bank to its customers. We offer personalized and insightful advice & frictionless experiences through multiple channels (Easy Banking Web & App), brands (Fortis, Hello bank!, Fintro) and business lines (Retail & Private banking, Bank for Entrepreneurs, Corporate banking). If you are interested in being part of that adventure, keep reading further !
By joining the Lending squad, you will have the opportunity to work on all Credit related topics (from onboarding new customers to managing the customer data, rebranding the employee application).
Function  description
As a skilled Front end Developer, you will join fantastic teams of Software development specialists and work in an Agile squad where you’ll be responsible of
·       Translating requirements into high quality code
·       Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Javascript code with Backbone and React
·       Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ship new features
·       Work with outside data sources and APIs
·       Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
·       Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
·       Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
·       Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
 Language requirements
English
Sound knowledge of English as well as (at least) one local language
Education
Bachelor/Master or equivalent by experience
Agile requirements
A developer involved in Agile projects must have the "Agile mindset" which implies:
·       a positive attitude and pragmatism
·       thirst for knowledge: Agile is about learning and adapting. Knowledge sharing is key to success.
·       The goal of team success: Agile is about the success of the team, no individual success or heroic behavior. It is more important for the team to succeed than for the individual to have completed his/her tasks.
·       There is no failure, only feedback: Agile is about taking everything as lessons, adjusting actions based on the feedback, resulting in continuous improvement.

Beyond the roles:  Agile teams are cross-functional.  All required disciplines are represented in the team (analysis, development, testing, … ). However, although team members have a primary role representing a discipline, they are expected to take on other roles and contribute to other disciplines  whenever it helps towards reaching the sprint goal.
Required experience / knowledge
Between 2 and 5 years of relevant experience
Technical experience
mandatory

·       You are a "software craftsman" who sees software development as a craft

·       You know the principles of clean code and apply them effectively.
o   Understanding of the Javascript principles, TDD, DDD, design patterns and best practices of web applications.
o   You write readable code and do refactoring where necessary.
o   You are familiar with test driven development and you have practical experience with it

·       Technical Skills :
o   Proven knowledge of Javascript, Backbone, JQuery, React, Redux, Nodes JS
o   Knowledge of Git (Gitlab or alternative), Jenkins, SonarQube, Fortify, Confluence, JIRA
o   Knowledge of Continuous Integration/Deployment principles

nice to have
Knowledge of Docker, Container and Groovy
Business experience
preferable
Specific requirement for agile: practical experience with Scrum
Soft skills

·       You actively share your knowledge with your team
·       You dare to challenge the requirements you receive based on your expertise
·       Continuous learning: you contribute to the constant improvement of the functioning of the team



  Please submit your candidate in the attached template!

 Tx!


[CRONOS-logo]

Kind regards,
Kristin
Business development & Account Management

subject: System Engineer/Administrator (4. Expert (10+)) SWI000826 - for Swift - Reactiedatum verlengd
text_body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB
VOORRANG VASTE MEDEWERKERS


Hallo collega’s,

Voor Swift zoeken we een System Engineer/Administrator (4. Expert (10+)) SWI000826 die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:

Uiterste reactiedatum: 13/10/2023
Gewenste startdatum: 01/10/2023
Einddatum: 31/08/2024

Referentie: SWI000826
Titel: System Engineer/Administrator (4. Expert (10+))
Locatie: The Netherlands - Zoeterwoude
Status: Gepubliceerd
Type contract: Time & material
Categorie: Niet van toepassing
Aantal personen: 1
Afdeling: Technology Platform (TP)

About the role
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Lead DevOps/OpenShift Platform Engineer for AI/ML workloads to join our dynamic team. As a Lead DevOps/OpenShift Platform Engineer, you will be responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of our on-prem Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform infrastructure tailored for AI/ML workloads. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams across the organisation to support the development, deployment, and operations of our applications, services, and infrastructure.

As a Lead DevOps/OpenShift Platform Engineer, you are responsible for technical leadership within the AI/ML Platform team and are a role model for colleagues who can rely on your guidance.

You are self-motivated, proactive and thrive in taking ownership of your work. You possess the ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and drive projects forward with minimal supervision. Your proactive nature enables you to identify opportunities for improvement, propose innovative solutions, and take the initiative to implement them. Delivering high-quality results and committing to meeting deadlines are key contributors to the success of our team and organisation.

About the team
The AI/ML Platform squad is part of the Platform Tribe. Our squad delivers and operates on-prem Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform clusters tailored for AI/ML workloads.
As part of our commitment to Agile principles, we have embraced the Scrum framework to enhance productivity transparency, and adaptability in our activities. We value iterative and incremental development, which allows us to deliver value to our stakeholders while improving our processes.
Our internal processes are highly automated and focus on security, scalability, and operability. Our automation for infrastructure and application deployment follows the GitOps approach.

Key responsibilities


  *   Work with the Product Owner and Squad members to build and operate the SWIFT AI/ML Platform
  *   Architect and build scalable, secure, and highly available infrastructure using company and industry best practices
  *   Develop and maintain automation for the deployment, configuration and ongoing management of the AI/ML Platform including components such as: OpenShift Container Platform, OpenShift Data Foundation, Kove software defined memory, Aqua Container Security, and InfiniBand network
  *   Analyse system performance and make recommendations for improvements
  *   Work closely with development teams to optimize and streamline the onboarding and CI/CD processes
  *   Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to infrastructure, deployment, security and performance
  *   Automate, build, test and release in accordance with the GitOps approach
  *   Ensure the AI/ML Platform adheres to security and compliance standards
  *   Implement and maintain monitoring solutions to ensure high availability and performance of the AI/ML Platform
  *   Document platform architecture, processes, and procedures
  *   Implement and maintain relevant mechanisms related to access controls, security policies and encryption mechanisms
  *   Participate in meetings and Scrum ceremonies
  *   Collaborate with development, operations, and other stakeholders to provide technical expertise and support

Technical skills and competencies


  *   Bachelors’ degree or masters’ degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent work experience)
  *   Strong experience in designing, implementing, and managing OpenShift (v4) platform infrastructure

     *   UPI deployments experience desired or strong understanding of IPI deployments

  *   Proficiency in deploying and managing OpenShift clusters in a production environment
  *   Experience with infrastructure as code and GitOps approach (e.g. ArgoCD, Git)
  *   Strong scripting and automation skills (Bash, Python)
  *   Experience with monitoring tools (e.g. Prometheus, Elastic)
  *   Experience with container security tools (e.g. Aqua Security, Open Policy Agent)
  *   Experience in a programming language such as Java or Go
  *   Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Podman) – 5+ years
  *   Knowledge of Linux – 5+ years
  *   Familiarity with security best practices and compliance standards, benchmarks, and recommendations
  *   Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
  *   Strong communication and collaboration skills, team player and customer focused
  *   Autonomous and driven
  *   Any of the following certifications are a strong asset:

     *   Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist (CKS)
     *   Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
     *   Red Hat Certified Specialist in OpenShift Administration (EX280)
     *   Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE)
     *   Red Hat Certified System Administrator (RHCSA)

  *   Fluent in English (spoken and written)

About the Platform Tribe
The Platform Tribe aims to deliver highly secure, reliable, cost-effective and easy-to-use standardized/generalized private cloud infrastructure and platform services allowing our business teams to focus on value delivery to Swift customers.

About Swift
Swift is world’s leading provider of secure financial messaging services. Our messaging platform, products and services connect more than 11,000 institutions. We enable our global community of users to communicate securely, exchanging standardized financial messages in a reliable way, thereby facilitating global and local financial flows, and supporting trade and commerce all around the world.
People are the foundations of our success. We depend on technological and business excellence – and on a culture that values diversity, strives for sustainability and fosters a healthy work/life balance.

Opdracht informatie
Projectnaam: OCP AI/ML
Werkregime: Voltijds
Vaardigheden

SPECIFIEKE VAARDIGHEDEN
container security tools (e.g. Aqua Security, Open Policy Agent): Ja
containerization technologies (Docker, Podman): Professional (4-5) (4,00 jaar)
deploying and managing OpenShift clusters in a production environment: Ja
Experience with infrastructure as code and GitOps approach: Ja
Familiarity with security best practices and compliance standards, benchmarks, and recommendations: Ja
Linux Adminstration: Professional (4-5) (4,00 jaar)
monitoring tools (e.g. Prometheus, Elastic): Ja
scripting and automation skills (Bash, Python): Professional (4-5) (4,00 jaar)

subject: Cloud engineer MNC000055 - for Manuchar
text_body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB
VOORRANG AAN VASTE WERKNEMERS

Hi P&C,

Voor Manuchar (Antwerpen) zijn we op zoek naar een Cloud engineer MNC000055 met volgende beschrijving:

-------------------------------------------

Gewenste startdatum: Zo snel mogelijk
Referentie: MNC000055
Titel: Cloud engineer
Locatie: Hoofdkantoor Merksem (Antwerpen)
Type contract: Time & material
Aantal personen: 1

Manuchar, headquartered in Antwerp, Belgium is a leading distributor of chemicals in emerging markets. We complement our Chemical Distribution business with International Trade Services in steel, polymers and several other raw materials.
In 2022 we handled 4 million metric tons of goods, generating 2.8 billion USD in sales. Our local operations are in over 35 countries and 160 locations. Manuchar employs 2,600 professionals worldwide.
At Manuchar "We keep your production running. Anytime. Anywhere.”

At Manuchar we like to MoveIT! From 2022 and onwards, we want to go to the next level in unlocking the value of our data and will be replacing our core systems and removing future barriers.
Do you want to be a crucial part of our journey towards that goal?

We are looking to onboard an Azure Cloud Engineer in our Infrastructure and Engineering team.

Context

  *   You will be part of the Infrastructure & Engineering team which manages our global Azure Cloud environment
  *   We adopted both a IaS and Devops way of working
  *   You will be in charge of architecting Azure Virtual Desktop in a international environment
  *   You will take part in ongoing zero trust security initiative
  *   Work closely with DevOps, development, and security teams to ensure seamless integration of cloud services.

Your Main tasks are:

  *   Design, document and transfer knowledge on Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD)
  *   Work closely with the Workplace team to assure optimal performance in a secure workplace
  *   Collaborate with developers to ensure infrastructure is code-driven and version-controlled.
  *   Create and maintain infrastructure as code templates using Bicep to automate the provisioning of Azure resources. (IaC)
  *   Support the development and enforce security best practices for Azure resources, including identity and access management (IAM), Azure Security Center, and Azure Policy.
  *   Monitor and respond to security incidents and vulnerabilities in the Azure environment.
  *   Continuously optimize Azure resources for cost-effectiveness, performance, and scalability.
  *   Stay current with Azure platform and propose improvements

Your profile:

  *   You have a bachelor’s or master’s degree combined with relevant experience as a Azure Engineer/Architect
  *   You have solid knowledge of the Microsoft Azure platform
  *   You have expert knowledge in Azure Virtual Desktop and have experience in design and rollout of large environments
  *   You are familiar with Azure Devops (Boards & CI/CD Pipelines)
  *   You are hands-on with a ‘can do attitude’.
  *   You are flexible and pay attention to detail.
  *   You are proactive & adaptive and think in terms of solutions.
  *   You are fluent in English, knowledge of Dutch/Spanish/Portuguese is a plus

Manuchar offers you
- a job full of variety with perspectives in an international environment
- cooperation with motivated & skilled colleagues in an open company culture
- a nice workspace where you can fully develop your talents

-------------------------------------------

subject: Elia (Brussel) - 4 Medior Integration Layer Developer (.NET)
text_body:
Collega’s,

Voor Elia zijn wij op zoek naar 4 Medior Integration Layer Developer om hun Market Data Product team te versterken. (dit is geen teamsaanvraag)

Startdatum: 04/09/2023
Einddatum: 28/02/2025
Locatie: Brussel

Description
ELIA manages the Belgian high voltage network and its role is to transport electricity. The purpose of the high voltage network is to transport the electricity supplied by electricity producers to distribution grid operators and large industrial users. In its capacity as network manager, ELIA ensures that transparent, non-discriminatory and objective access to the network is guaranteed. ELIA owns all Belgian network infrastructures between 150 and 380 kV and almost 94% of the network infrastructure between 30 and 70 kV.
ELIA's network is a key link between France, Europe's largest electricity exporter, and markets in Northern Europe.

In the scope of the evolution of the Elia’s IT, we are actively looking for an external experienced integration layer developer. He will be integrated in the “Market” Data Product team (or potentially another data product team).

Tasks

  *   Design and implementation of the physical model of a coherent data model
  *   Analysis, design, development and testing of a transversal integration layer
  *   Ensure the alignment between the business/technical architecture and the functional/non-functional needs of the clients
  *   Bring concrete experience in terms of best practice in the integration layer concepts.
  *   Actively participate in the planning of the different phases of the integration project, in close relation with other IT teams, external partners and the business.
  *   Guarantee performance and trust in the solution by participating to the set up and following of a continuous build and testing platform
  *   Collaborating with the competency leader to contribute in the maturity development of the integration engineers
  *   Bring technical expertise to the team as well as infrastructure knowledge of tools used by the Integration Hub (queue manager, distributed cache, audit and monitoring)
  *   Participate in the setup of an efficient and dynamic documentation solution
  *   Second and third line support for production

Skills

  *   Distributed architecture patterns (synchronous & asynchronous)
  *   Distributed cache patterns
  *   Unit Testing, automated
  *   Integration Testing, automated
  *   Continuous Integration development
  *   Experience in .Net/Microsoft platform  (3+ years)
  *   Integration framework experience (3+ years)
  *   Scheduler framework experience (3+ years)
  *   Audit and Trace framework experience (3+ years)
  *   Efficient monitoring tools experience (3+ years)
  *   Web Services (REST, SOAP), XML, Flat Files, GraphQL, Messaging-/Steaming based communication
  *   Capabilities to help in the administration of the tools used (mixed environment Windows and Unix)
  *   Fluent English

Alvast bedankt voor de feedback omtrent mogelijke kandidaten.

Mvg,

Johanna
Business and Sales Support
De Cronos Groep nv
Veldkant 33a
B-2550 Kontich

##################@email.com

subject: Engie GEMS (Brussel) - Medior .NET Developer
text_body:
Collega’s,

Voor Engie zijn wij op zoek naar een Medior .NET Developer.

Startdatum: ASAP
Duurtijd: 1 jaar
Locatie: Brussel

Description
To increase its competitiveness and pursue its development in the best conditions, GEM IS significantly invests in its information system. The Power Trading applications are all developed in-house and written in C#, Angular and Python (with Numpy and Pandas) and are hosted in the Azure cloud using Kubernetes. There is a high demand for adding new features to these applications as well as for extending the existing portfolio.

The service shall be carried out within the Power Trading team within the ENGIE Global Energy Management division.  The purpose of the role is to support and build in-house tools which service the trading desk: booking automation, pricing, risk/PnL analysis, trading signals, and execution automation.

Tasks

  *   Develop and maintain the Power Trading applications
  *   Support design and troubleshooting efforts
  *   Mentor junior software engineers.
  *   Promote technical growth, making recommendations on software.
  *   Determine operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, solution development, and proposed solutions.
  *   Develop software solutions by studying information needs, conferring with users, and studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes.

Skills

  *   C#
  *   Software development
  *   Unit testing
  *   Problem solving & debugging skills
  *   Logging & exception handling
  *   Writing clear & maintainable code
  *   Working knowledge of software best practices
  *   Portfolio & risk management
  *   Experience building trading or financial software
  *   Being able to work close with the business users and learning their businesses
  *   Fluent in English

Nice to have or at least willing to learn:

  *   Cloud (Azure/AWS)
  *   Kubernetes
  *   Python
  *   Angular
  *   Pandas
  *   GIT
  *   Azure DevOps

Alvast bedankt voor de feedback omtrent mogelijke kandidaten.

Mvg,

subject: System Engineer/Administrator (4. Expert (10+)) - For Swift -SWI000802- Reactiedatum verlengd!
text_body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB

VOORRANG VASTE MEDEWERKERS



Hallo collega’s,



Voor Swift zoeken we een System Engineer/Administrator (4. Expert (10+)) die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:





Uiterste reactiedatum: 28/07/2023
Gewenste startdatum: 01/09/2023
Einddatum: 31/08/2024



Referentie: SWI000802
Titel: System Engineer/Administrator (4. Expert (10+))
Locatie: The Netherlands - Zoeterwoude (Energieweg 33, 2382 NC Zoeterwoude, Nederland)
Status: Gepubliceerd
Type contract: Time & material
Categorie: Niet van toepassing
Aantal personen: 1
Afdeling: Technology Platform (TP)



Omschrijving



About the role

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Lead DevOps/OpenShift Platform Engineer for AI/ML workloads to join our dynamic team. As a Lead DevOps/OpenShift Platform Engineer, you will be responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of our on-prem Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform infrastructure tailored for AI/ML workloads.

You will collaborate with cross-functional teams across the organisation to support the development, deployment, and operations of our applications, services, and infrastructure.
As a Lead DevOps/OpenShift Platform Engineer, you are responsible for technical leadership within the AI/ML Platform team and are a role model for colleagues who can rely on your guidance.

You are self-motivated, proactive and thrive in taking ownership of your work. You possess the ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and drive projects forward with minimal supervision. Your proactive nature enables you to identify opportunities for improvement, propose innovative solutions, and take the initiative to implement them.
Delivering high-quality results and committing to meeting deadlines are key contributors to the success of our team and organisation.

About the team

The AI/ML Platform squad is part of the Platform Tribe. Our squad delivers and operates on-prem Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform clusters tailored for AI/ML workloads.
As part of our commitment to Agile principles, we have embraced the Scrum framework to enhance productivity transparency, and adaptability in our activities. We value iterative and incremental development, which allows us to deliver value to our stakeholders while improving our processes.
Our internal processes are highly automated and focus on security, scalability, and operability. Our automation for infrastructure and application deployment follows the GitOps approach.


Key responsibilities

• Work with the Product Owner and Squad members to build and operate the SWIFT AI/ML Platform
• Architect and build scalable, secure, and highly available infrastructure using company and industry best practices
• Develop and maintain automation for the deployment, configuration and ongoing management of the AI/ML Platform including components such as: OpenShift Container Platform, OpenShift Data Foundation, Kove software defined memory, Aqua Container Security, and InfiniBand network
• Analyse system performance and make recommendations for improvements
• Work closely with development teams to optimize and streamline the onboarding and CI/CD processes
• Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to infrastructure, deployment, security and performance
• Automate, build, test and release in accordance with the GitOps approach
• Ensure the AI/ML Platform adheres to security and compliance standards
• Implement and maintain monitoring solutions to ensure high availability and performance of the AI/ML Platform
• Document platform architecture, processes, and procedures
• Implement and maintain relevant mechanisms related to access controls, security policies and encryption mechanisms
• Participate in meetings and Scrum ceremonies
• Collaborate with development, operations, and other stakeholders to provide technical expertise and support

Technical skills and competencies

• Bachelors’ degree or masters’ degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent work experience)
• Strong experience in designing, implementing, and managing OpenShift (v4) platform infrastructure
o UPI deployments experience desired or strong understanding of IPI deployments
• Proficiency in deploying and managing OpenShift clusters in a production environment
• Experience with infrastructure as code and GitOps approach (e.g. ArgoCD, Git)
• Strong scripting and automation skills (Bash, Python)
• Experience with monitoring tools (e.g. Prometheus, Elastic)
• Experience with container security tools (e.g. Aqua Security, Open Policy Agent)
• Experience in a programming language such as Java or Go
• Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Podman) – 5+ years
• Knowledge of Linux – 5+ years

• Familiarity with security best practices and compliance standards, benchmarks, and recommendations
• Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
• Strong communication and collaboration skills, team player and customer focused
• Autonomous and driven
• Any of the following certifications are a strong asset:
o Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist (CKS)
o Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
o Red Hat Certified Specialist in OpenShift Administration (EX280)
o Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE)
o Red Hat Certified System Administrator (RHCSA)
• Fluent in English (spoken and written)


About the Platform Tribe

The Platform Tribe aims to deliver highly secure, reliable, cost-effective and easy-to-use standardized/generalized private cloud infrastructure and platform services allowing our business teams to focus on value delivery to Swift customers.

About Swift

Swift is world’s leading provider of secure financial messaging services. Our messaging platform, products and services connect more than 11,000 institutions. We enable our global community of users to communicate securely, exchanging standardized financial messages in a reliable way, thereby facilitating global and local financial flows, and supporting trade and commerce all around the world.
People are the foundations of our success. We depend on technological and business excellence – and on a culture that values diversity, strives for sustainability and fosters a healthy work/life balance.
Opdracht informatie


Opdracht informatie


Projectnaam: OCP AI/ML
Werkregime: Voltijds



Vaardigheden

SPECIFIEKE VAARDIGHEDEN


  *   container security tools (e.g. Aqua Security, Open Policy Agent): Ja
  *   containerization technologies (Docker, Podman: Professional (4-5)
  *   deploying and managing OpenShift clusters in a production environment: Ja
  *   Experience with infrastructure as code and GitOps approach: Ja
  *   Linux Adminstration: Professional (4-5)
  *   monitoring tools (e.g. Prometheus, Elastic): Ja
  *   scripting and automation skills (Bash, Python): Professional (4-5)

ALGEMENE VAARDIGHEDEN


  *   Familiarity with security best practices and compliance standards, benchmarks, and recommendations: Ja




Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.

Alvast hartelijk bedankt.

Key Account Manager
